channel.title: Silabsoft client wont run! ARG help please
channel.description:
First of all, id like to THANK MISS SILABSOFT for releasing this, its a whole new Moparscape :)
Second, I NEED HELP! lol.
I have redownloaded WinRar 80 million times, i reloaded java a few times, and i cannot open up the client from my WinRar, so i can't play on peoples' servers!
-_-_-In order to open up the client after you download it, does the runserver.bat thing have to run properly? Because mine says " [code] C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client. jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
so im not sure if that is right.
Also, when i try to run the client, (client.jar), the window pops up for less than a second, and then goes away and doesnt load.
PLEASE help me, i really want to play with this awesome new client.

item.title: Silabsoft client wont run! ARG help please

item.title: Silabsoft client wont run! ARG help please
item.dc:creator: @lilbunnyfufu lilbunnyfufu
item.description:
@lilbunnyfufu wrote:

First of all, id like to THANK MISS SILABSOFT for releasing this, its a whole new Moparscape

Second, I NEED HELP! lol.

I have redownloaded WinRar 80 million times, i reloaded java a few times, and i cannot open up the client from my WinRar, so i can’t play on peoples’ servers!

---In order to open up the client after you download it, does the runserver.bat thing have to run properly? Because mine says " [code]
C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.
jar 0 0 highmem members 0
‘JAVA’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents>pause
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

so im not sure if that is right.

Also, when i try to run the client, (client.jar), the window pops up for less than a second, and then goes away and doesnt load.

PLEASE help me, i really want to play with this awesome new client.
